name: Where is my Home?
description:
Home (Beta) Made Within the given time for A pygame Jam.

Not Completed yet, but made a demo version of it so I could get feedback. 

Comment down,

  • Should I complete the game?
  • What is it lagging
  • New features
  • Levels?

  1. Download Home(beta).zip file.
  2. UnZip the file to the desired location
  3. Run the Main file(assets folder is important, provided in folder home(beta).zip file, do not delete it)
    1. Non-pygammer should run main.exe file (Console is visible for making sure that game is running, in slower PCs)
    2. Developer with python installed can run main.py file.
  4. Enjoy the Adventure

Thanks for playing.

ChangeLog:

FullScreen Supported
